General.Name: Xinya Electronic Co Ltd
General.Description: Xinya Electronic Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells wires and cables in China and internationally. It offers UL electrical wiring, power cord, automotive wires, coaxial cable, flexible industrial cable, high speed transmission cable, and medical cable. The company's products are used in the areas of household appliances, computers, intelligent office, industrial control equipment, automotive electronics, data servers, and new energy technology. Xinya Electronic Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Yueqing, China.
General.Address: Wenzhou Daqiao Industrial Zone, Yueqing, China, 325603
